remarks: The monoid operation of a free monoid.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Sep-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Feb-2016.)
statement:
frmdbas.m $e |- M = ( freeMnd ` I ) $.
frmdbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
frmdplusg.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` M ) $.
frmdplusg $p |- .+ = ( ++ |` ( B X. B ) ) $.
